name: Partagas - LCDH (La Casa Del Habano) - Salomones
additionalNotes: Don Jaime Partagás created the Partagás brand in Cuba in 1845, and he constructed the majestic Partagás cigar factory as a proud symbol of his brand, which later was run by Ramón Cifuentes until he lost it to nationalization. Cuba’s Partagás brand is large and includes the rich and bold Lusitania, a double corona, as well as the best-selling handmade cigar from Cuba, the robusto-sized Serie D No. 4.
